job_tasks.phrase: The successful candidate will divide their time primarily between these two domains.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand and balance priorities across different projects and departments.

job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: Although not explicitly stated, supporting researchers and developing new digital applications for research purposes implies aligning technical efforts with the strategic goals of the department and the NWO-KIC project.
This directly refers to the processes involved in data collection and analysis, which are foundational to data engineering.
This phrase explicitly mentions data collection and processing (annotation), which falls under data engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: develop new digital applications which can be used for research purposes
job_tasks.justification: This clearly describes the development of software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: developing, maintaining, and/or customizing new and existing tools for research purposes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase encompasses the core activities of software development, including creation, upkeep, and modification of tools.

job_tasks.phrase: offering small-scale programming support for individual researchers
job_tasks.justification: This indicates direct involvement in programming and software development tasks, albeit on a smaller scale.

job_tasks.phrase: supporting the development and implementation of this platform
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions the development and implementation of a digital platform.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborating with researchers within the NWO-KIC project for the technical development of a self-management platform
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration on the technical development of a specific platform.

job_tasks.phrase: help to manage the computational research infrastructure of the department
job_tasks.justification: Managing research infrastructure, which would include the systems supporting computational research, aligns with operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: setting up a digital support structure for the department, maintaining an overview of available tools
job_tasks.justification: This involves establishing and maintaining systems and processes for computational support, which is a function of operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: offering support in the education of technical skills, such as programming or (automated) data collection and annotation
job_tasks.justification: While primarily educational, teaching programming and data collection/annotation implies an understanding of modeling concepts used in these areas.

soft_skills.phrase: offer support to researchers, PhD candidates and (research master) students
develop new digital applications which can be used for research purposes
development and implementation of this platform
technical development of a self-management platform
Since this is a new function, we anticipate that the successful candidate will help set-up a digital support structure for the department

classification.rationale: This role is primarily focused on supporting researchers with computational methods and software development for research purposes, rather than developing generative AI models. While there is some mention of data collection and analysis, it lacks the specific focus on LLMs, diffusion models, or advanced generative techniques that would define a GenAI Engineer. The role is more aligned with a general Research Software Engineer.
